ActHazardous Materials Information Review Act
PrecisRe-appointment of GORDON E. LLOYD of Manotick, Ontario, to be governor representing suppliers at the Council of the Hazardous Materials Information Review Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective October 17, 2003.
